#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		 int n;
    cin>>n;
    int a[10000];
    int i,b[n];
    for(i = 1; i <= 10000; i++)
    {
        a[i] = 0;
    }
    for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
    {
        cin>>b[i];
        a[b[i]]++;
    }
    int max = 0;
    int pos = 0;
    for(i = 1; i <= 10000; i++)
    {
        if(a[i] > max)
        {
            max = a[i];
            pos = i;
        }
    }
    cout<<pos<<" "<<max<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
